name: Project X - Example Board
desc: An example Trello board for a generic project, demonstrating the script's capabilities.

cards.name: Set up project repository
cards.desc: Create a new Git repository and initialize it with a basic structure.

cards.name: Design user authentication flow
cards.desc: Outline the steps for user registration, login, and password recovery.

cards.name: Implement basic API endpoints
cards.desc: Develop initial API routes for user management and data retrieval.

cards.name: Fix styling issues on homepage
cards.desc: Address responsive design problems and ensure consistent branding.

cards.name: Complete database schema design
cards.desc: Finalize the database tables, relationships, and data types.

cards.name: Brainstorm new feature ideas
cards.desc: Hold a team session to generate innovative ideas for future releases.
